code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var todoId=1;export var slice=createSlice({name:"todo",initialState:[],reducers:{create:function create(state,action){state.push({id:todoId,description:action.payload,isComplete:false});todoId++;},edit:function edit(state,action){var todoToEdit=state.find(function(todo){return todo.id===action.payload.id;});if(todoToEdit){todoToEdit.description=action.payload.description;}},toggleComplete:function toggleComplete(state,action){var todoToToggle=state.find(function(todo){return todo.id===action.payload.id;});if(todoToToggle){todoToToggle.isComplete=!todoToToggle.isComplete;}},remove:function remove(state,action){var deleteIndex=state.findIndex(function(todo){return todo.id===action.payload.id;});if(deleteIndex!==-1){state.splice(deleteIndex,1);}}}});var _slice$actions=slice.actions,create=_slice$actions.create,edit=_slice$actions.edit,toggleComplete=_slice$actions.toggleComplete,remove=_slice$actions.remove;export{create,edit,toggleComplete,remove};export default slice.reducer;
